content: घातः [हन्-णिच् घञ्] {@--1@} A blow, stroke, bruise, hit; ज्याघात <ls>Ś. 3. 13</ls>; नयनशरघात <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; so पार्ष्णिघातः, शिरोघात &c. {@--2@} Killing, hurting, destruction, slaughter; वियोगो मुग्धाक्ष्याः स खलु रिपुघ तावधिरभूत् <ls>U. 3. 44</ls>; पशुघातः <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 159</ls>; <ls n="Y.">3. 252.</ls> {@--3@} An arrow. {@--4@} Power. {@--5@} The product of a sum in multiplication. (In <ab>comp.</ab> translated by ‘inauspicious’; °दिवसः).
